segments.text: I'm going to the fair now.if any one looks for me . ask them to call the fair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the telephone number there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About ten.another thing is that I want an appointment with the customer at Changing hotel at three thirty this afternoon.please help me phone the customer so we can confirm now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the customer's name , and what is his room number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can check them from the fax yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I'll phone the customer right away.Do you want to pick him up at our office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'll discuss the business with him at hotel .
segments.speaker: S1
